project_abstract.cdata: The proposed project would comprise: the construction, and related supervision, of the Hargeisa-Borama Road with a link to Tug Wajale in Northern Somalia, feasibility and detailed engineering studies of the Dinsor-Bardera-Gelib Road in Southern Somalia, and strengthening of the Civil Engineering Department of the Ministry of Public Works through provision of technical assistance, training and machineshop equipment.
